QWidget: background-color: #ffffff; color: #333333; font-family: 'Segoe UI', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;
QPushButton: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #e8e8e8, stop: 1 #d6d6d6); color: #333333; border: 1px solid #a0a0a0; padding: 8px 16px; border-radius: 4px; font-weight: 500; font-size: 10pt; min-width: 80px; min-height: 28px;
QPushButton:hover: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #f0f0f0, stop: 1 #e0e0e0); border-color: #8a8a8a;
QPushButton:pressed: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #d0d0d0, stop: 1 #c0c0c0); border-color: #707070;
QLineEdit: border: 1px solid #a0a0a0; border-radius: 3px; padding: 6px 8px; background: white; color: #333333; font-size: 10pt; min-height: 20px;
QComboBox: border: 1px solid #a0a0a0; border-radius: 3px; padding: 6px 8px; background: white; color: #333333; font-size: 10pt; min-width: 120px; min-height: 20px;
QComboBox::drop-down: subcontrol-origin: padding; subcontrol-position: top right; width: 20px; border-left: 1px solid #a0a0a0; background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #f0f0f0, stop: 1 #e0e0e0); border-top-right-radius: 3px; border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
QComboBox::drop-down:hover: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #e8e8e8, stop: 1 #d8d8d8);
QComboBox::down-arrow: border-left: 5px solid transparent; border-right: 5px solid transparent; border-top: 5px solid #333333; width: 0; height: 0; margin: 3px;
QComboBox QAbstractItemView: border: 1px solid #a0a0a0; border-radius: 3px; background-color: white; selection-background-color: #d0d0d0; selection-color: #333333; padding: 2px;
QSpinBox: border: 1px solid #a0a0a0; border-radius: 3px; padding: 6px 8px; background: white; color: #333333; font-size: 10pt; min-height: 20px;
QSpinBox::up-button: subcontrol-origin: border; subcontrol-position: top right; width: 20px; border-left: 1px solid #a0a0a0; border-bottom: 1px solid #a0a0a0; background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #f0f0f0, stop: 1 #e0e0e0); border-top-right-radius: 3px;
QSpinBox::down-button: subcontrol-origin: border; subcontrol-position: bottom right; width: 20px; border-left: 1px solid #a0a0a0; border-top: 1px solid #a0a0a0; background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #f0f0f0, stop: 1 #e0e0e0); border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
QSpinBox::up-button:hover: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #e8e8e8, stop: 1 #d8d8d8);
QSpinBox::down-button:hover: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #e8e8e8, stop: 1 #d8d8d8);
QSpinBox::up-button:pressed: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #d0d0d0, stop: 1 #c0c0c0);
QSpinBox::down-button:pressed: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #d0d0d0, stop: 1 #c0c0c0);
QDoubleSpinBox: border: 1px solid #a0a0a0; border-radius: 3px; padding: 6px 8px; background: white; color: #333333; font-size: 10pt; min-height: 20px;
QDoubleSpinBox::up-button: subcontrol-origin: border; subcontrol-position: top right; width: 20px; border-left: 1px solid #a0a0a0; border-bottom: 1px solid #a0a0a0; background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #f0f0f0, stop: 1 #e0e0e0); border-top-right-radius: 3px;
QDoubleSpinBox::down-button: subcontrol-origin: border; subcontrol-position: bottom right; width: 20px; border-left: 1px solid #a0a0a0; border-top: 1px solid #a0a0a0; background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #f0f0f0, stop: 1 #e0e0e0); border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
QDoubleSpinBox::up-button:hover: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #e8e8e8, stop: 1 #d8d8d8);
QDoubleSpinBox::down-button:hover: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #e8e8e8, stop: 1 #d8d8d8);
QDoubleSpinBox::up-button:pressed: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #d0d0d0, stop: 1 #c0c0c0);
QDoubleSpinBox::down-button:pressed: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #d0d0d0, stop: 1 #c0c0c0);
QDoubleSpinBox::up-arrow: border-left: 4px solid transparent; border-right: 4px solid transparent; border-bottom: 4px solid #333333; width: 0; height: 0; margin: 2px;
QDoubleSpinBox::down-arrow: border-left: 4px solid transparent; border-right: 4px solid transparent; border-top: 4px solid #333333; width: 0; height: 0; margin: 2px;
QGroupBox: font-weight: 600; color: #333333; border: 1px solid #c0c0c0; border-radius: 5px; margin-top: 10px; padding-top: 12px; background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #ffffff, stop: 1 #f5f5f5);
QGroupBox::title: subcontrol-origin: margin; left: 10px; padding: 3px 10px; background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #e8e8e8, stop: 1 #d6d6d6); color: #333333; border: 1px solid #a0a0a0; border-radius: 3px; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: 600;
QTabWidget::pane: border: 1px solid #c0c0c0; background-color: white; border-radius: 0 5px 5px 5px; margin-top: 0px;
QTabBar::tab: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #f0f0f0, stop: 1 #e0e0e0); color: #333333; border: 1px solid #c0c0c0; padding: 6px 12px; margin-right: 1px; border-bottom: none; border-top-left-radius: 5px; border-top-right-radius: 5px; font-weight: 500; font-size: 10pt; min-width: 70px;
QTabBar::tab:selected: background: white; color: #333333; border-bottom: 1px solid white; font-weight: 600;
QTabBar::tab:hover: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #e8e8e8, stop: 1 #d8d8d8); color: #333333;
QTextEdit: border: 1px solid #a0a0a0; border-radius: 3px; padding: 8px; background-color: white; color: #333333; font-family: 'Consolas', 'Monaco', monospace; font-size: 10pt;
QTableWidget: background-color: white; alternate-background-color: #f8f8f8; color: #333333; border: 1px solid #c0c0c0; border-radius: 3px; gridline-color: #e0e0e0; font-size: 10pt; selection-background-color: #d0d0d0; selection-color: #333333; margin: 5px; padding: 0px;
QHeaderView::section: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #f0f0f0, stop: 1 #e0e0e0); color: #333333; border: 1px solid #c0c0c0; border-left: none; border-right: none; padding: 4px 3px; font-weight: 600; font-size: 9pt; text-align: center;
QHeaderView::section:hover: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #e8e8e8, stop: 1 #d8d8d8);
QGraphicsView: background: white; border: 1px solid #c0c0c0; border-radius: 3px; padding: 2px; margin: 5px;
ButtonDisconnected: background: #e74c3c; color: white; border-radius: 4px; border: 1px solid #c0392b; padding: 6px 12px; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: 600;
ButtonConnected: background: #27ae60; color: white; border-radius: 4px; border: 1px solid #229954; padding: 6px 12px; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: 600;
ButtonSuccess: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #27ae60, stop: 1 #229954); color: white; border: 1px solid #1e8449; padding: 8px 16px; border-radius: 4px; font-weight: 500; font-size: 10pt; min-width: 80px; min-height: 28px;
ButtonSuccess:hover: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #229954, stop: 1 #1e8449); border-color: #1e8449;
ButtonWarning: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #f39c12, stop: 1 #e67e22); color: white; border: 1px solid #d68910; padding: 8px 16px; border-radius: 4px; font-weight: 500; font-size: 10pt; min-width: 80px; min-height: 28px;
ButtonWarning:hover: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #e67e22, stop: 1 #d68910); border-color: #d68910;
ButtonDanger: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #e74c3c, stop: 1 #c0392b); color: white; border: 1px solid #a93226; padding: 8px 16px; border-radius: 4px; font-weight: 500; font-size: 10pt; min-width: 80px; min-height: 28px;
ButtonDanger:hover: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #c0392b, stop: 1 #a93226); border-color: #a93226;
ButtonSecondary: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #95a5a6, stop: 1 #7f8c8d); color: white; border: 1px solid #6c7b7d; padding: 8px 16px; border-radius: 4px; font-weight: 500; font-size: 10pt; min-width: 80px; min-height: 28px;
ButtonSecondary:hover: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #7f8c8d, stop: 1 #6c7b7d); border-color: #6c7b7d;
QPushButton[iconButton=\"true\"]: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #f0f0f0, stop: 1 #e0e0e0); border: 1px solid #a0a0a0; border-radius: 3px; padding: 4px; min-width: 28px; min-height: 24px;
QPushButton[iconButton=\"true\"]:hover: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #e8e8e8, stop: 1 #d8d8d8); border-color: #808080;
QPushButton[iconButton=\"true\"]:pressed: background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #d0d0d0, stop: 1 #c0c0c0); border-color: #606060;
